Salma Hayek celebrates day of the dead and remembers her pets with a traditional offering
Salma Hayek does not forget the Mexican traditions and so was the altar of the dead that he placed in his house
04 Nov 2019, 01:52 by RedacciÃ³n
Salma Hayek showed that she does not forget the traditions of the country that saw her being born and through her official Instagram account, she showed her followers the altar of the dead that she placed in her house.
In the offering you can see several photographs, candles, dead bread, cempasuchil flower and confetti of various colors, but what caught the attention of his followers was that the altar was dedicated to his dogs that have died, as it is known That the actress is a true animal lover.
